content: As an AI language model, I cannot hold opinions. However, individuals are responsible for being critical viewers and consumers of media. While it is the responsibility of the producers to present a responsible and accurate portrayal of the subject's crimes, viewers should also exercise due diligence and do their research when consuming media. This includes fact-checking and verifying information presented in documentaries and movies, considering the context in which the movie was made, and being aware of any biases or perspectives presented. Ultimately, it is essential for the audience to understand that these productions are often storytelling devices, and while they can be informative and educational, they should not be relied upon as a substitute for thorough research and critical analysis.
